IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE MENTAL HEALTH, AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE SERVICES FOR PEOPLE SUFFERING FROM THOSE DISABILITIES IN CENTRAL NORTH CAROLINA.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED DIRECT BEHAVORIAL HEALTHCARE & SUBSTANCE ABUSE SERVICES TO THE CITIZENS OF 28 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL NORTH CAROLINA. SERVICES INCLUDE OUTPATIENT & FAMILY COUNSELING, MEDICAL PSYCHIATRIC SERVICES & EMERGENCY ASSESSMENT SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS IMPLEMENTED THE NEW ACCOUNTING REQUIREMENTS ASSOCIATED WITH UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES USING THE PROVISIONS OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD ("FASB") ASC 740, INCOME TAXES. USING THAT GUIDANCE, TAX POSITIONS INITIALLY NEED TO BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WHEN IT IS MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT THE POSITIONS WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAX AUTHORITIES. IT ALSO PROVIDES GUIDANCE FOR DERECOGNITION, CLASSIFICATION, INTEREST AND PENALTIES, ACCOUNTING IN INTERIM PERIODS, DISCLOSURE, AND TRANSITION. AS OF JUNE 30, 2015 AND 2016, THE ORGANIZATION HAD NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND RECOGNIZED NO SUCH INTEREST OR PENALTIES DURING THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30,2015 AND 2016.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART III, LINE 1, DESCRIPTION OF ORGANIZATION MISSION:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MISSION DRIVEN, COMPREHENSIVE COMMUNITY PROVIDER OF CULTURALLY SENSITIVE MENTAL HEALTH AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE SERVICES. THE DAYMARK GOAL IS FOR SKILLED MEDICAL AND BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS TO SUPPORT CITIZENS OF ALL AGES AND THEIR FAMILIES WITH THE GREATEST OPPORTUNITY FOR RECOVERY, INDEPENDENCE AND THE HIGHEST QUALITY OF LIFE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE CFO AND BOARD PRIOR TO FILING

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN ORDER TO ENSURE THE ABSENCE OF CONFLICT OF INTEREST WITHIN THE SERVICES THIS ORGANIZATION PROVIDES, DAYMARK INC. PROHIBITS THE PRACTICE OF STEERING OR DIRECTING REFERRALS OF APPLICANTS OR PERSONS SERVED TO A PRIVATE/PRACTICE IN WHICH PROFESSIONAL PERSONNEL, CONSULTANTS, OR THE IMMEDIATE FAMILIES OF PERSONNEL AND CONSULTANTS MAY BE ENGAGED

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SALARIES ARE DETERMINED BY THE NONCOMPENSATED BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATIONS TAX FILINGS ARE AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION AT THE CORPORATE OFFICE AS WELL AS ON WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THESE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION AT THE CORPORATE OFFICE
THE ORGANIZATION HAS NOT CHANGED EITHER ITS OVERSIGHT OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR
